issues.title: Elements must only use permitted ARIA attributes
issues.description: Ensure ARIA attributes are not prohibited for an element's role

none.message: aria-label attribute cannot be used on a div with no valid role attribute.

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  aria-label attribute cannot be used on a div with no valid role attribute.

issues.title: Elements use prohibited ARIA attributes
issues.description: Using ARIA attributes in roles where they are prohibited can mean that important information is not communicated to users of assistive technologies. [Learn more about prohibited ARIA roles](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/aria-prohibited-attr).

node.explanation:
Fix all of the following:
  aria-label attribute cannot be used on a div with no valid role attribute.

issues.title: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
issues.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.27 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #4a73e8, font size: 10.5pt (14px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.27 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #4a73e8, font size: 10.5pt (14px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 4.28:1. Recommendation:  change background to #466fe4.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 4.28:1. Recommendation:  change background to #466fe4.
original_issue.selector: html > body > main > div > div:nth-child(8) > a:nth-child(1)

issues.title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn how to provide sufficient color contrast](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/color-contrast).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.27 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #4a73e8, font size: 10.5pt (14px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

automatic.name: Headings; Wrong Order, Empty & Missing Headings;

issues.title: Page should contain a level-one heading
issues.description: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading

all.message: Page must have a level-one heading

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  Page must have a level-one heading

automatic.name: Size; Target Size; Element too small

issues.title: Touch targets do not have sufficient size or spacing.
issues.description: Touch targets with sufficient size and spacing help users who may have difficulty targeting small controls to activate the targets. [Learn more about touch targets](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/target-size).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (125.8px by 15.5px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 21.6px instead of at least 24px.
